articles.author: Dustin Long
articles.title: Long: Bubba Wallace takes pre-race message to heart to claim Brickyard 400 victory - NBC Sports
articles.description: Bubba Wallace's trip to victory lane at Indianapolis was more than a 400-mile trip, it was a journey of years.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS Amid the formality of the NASCAR Cup pre-race drivers meeting, Doug Boles had a message for competitors.
The president of Indianapolis Motor Speedway noted that this year marked the 30t… [+7353 chars]

articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: Prostate cancer: 7 myths that can delay cancer diagnosis in men - Times of India
articles.description: Prostate cancer affects many American men. Misinformation can delay diagnosis and treatment. Regular screening is important, especially after age 50.
